docs.snippet: An arbitrator has found that Minnesota State University, Mankato, had no grounds to fire head football coach Todd Hoffner last May and has ordered that the university immediately reinstate him, an attorney for the coach confirmed Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An arbitrator has found that Minnesota State University, Mankato, had no grounds to fire head football coach Todd Hoffner last May and has ordered that the university immediately reinstate him, an attorney for the coach confirmed Thursday.

headline.main: Arbitrator: Mankato University Wrong to Fire Coach
headline.print_headline: Arbitrator: Mankato University Wrong to Fire Coach

docs.snippet: The pre-pre-season opening kickoff of the 2014 National Football League schedule is returned for a score in "Draft Day," an entirely conventional serio-comic sports world melodrama that pushes its buttons with undeniable professional finesse. In h...
docs.lead_paragraph: The pre-pre-season opening kickoff of the 2014 National Football League schedule is returned for a score in "Draft Day," an entirely conventional serio-comic sports world melodrama that pushes its buttons with undeniable professional finesse. In his most effective full star turn in perhaps a decade, Kevin Costner dominates as the greenhorn general manager of the beleaguered Cleveland Browns who could emerge from the heavy shadow of his late revered father with the successful handling of the annual draft of college players.

headline.main: Review: 'Draft Day' Is an Off-Season Gift
headline.print_headline: Review: 'Draft Day' Is an Off-Season Gift

docs.abstract: Massachusetts guard Derrick Gordon reveals that he is gay, joining a fast-growing list of publicly gay male college and professional athletes; Gordon is believed to be the first publicly gay active men's player in Division I college basketball.
